name: Reflection Pattern
description: Asks the AI to reflect on and improve its own output

structure.reflection:
Then, reflect on:
- Potential issues
- Edge cases
- Improvements
- Alternative approaches

example:
Task: Write a function to merge two sorted arrays

First, provide your initial solution.

Then, reflect on:
- Potential issues
- Edge cases
- Improvements
- Alternative approaches

Finally, provide an improved solution.
